image.caption: Jamie and Timski on their wedding day, September 1, 2013

footer.p: Welcome to our website. We regenerate this web site from scratch using a set of tools Timski wrote using C# and XSLT. Content is updated whenever necessary. Feel free to look around. Please note that while the Information Superhighway is constantly being updated and seems like it is always running in realtime, our updates are far less frequent and this website does not in fact exactly mirror our knowledge nor our real life--it is only a snapshot and a window into itself.
